## Container.getInheritedInput() method

Return state that comes from the container and is passed down to the child. For instance, time range and filters are common inherited input state. Note that any state stored in `this.input.panels[embeddableId].explicitInput` will override inherited input.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected abstract getInheritedInput(id: string): TChildInput;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TChildInput`
